title: On N'enterre Pas le Dimanche = No Funeral on Sundays
abstract: Note: Adapted from the novel by Fred Kassak.
description: Philippe, a West Indian student, helps his Swedish girfriend, Margaretha, find a job as a secretary in a publishing house. Philippe has written a novel and the publisher's wife promise to help with the publishing of the novel in exchange for some special favours from Philippe. Awards: Prix Louis Delluc 1959.  Credits: Director, Michel Drach ; writers, Eric Ollivier, Michel Drach ; photography, Jean Tournier ; music, Eric Dixon, Kenny Clarke. Cast: Christina Bendz, Philippe Mory, Hella Petri, Albert Gilou, Marcel Cuvelier.
